Investors

For game developers, we offer an SDK to add aromas to your games and experiences. We also offer to do it for you in a short time. Together with you, we will select five smells that will emphasize the atmosphere of your game.

Our technology allows users to experience scents and vibrations during virtual reality gameplay or other virtual experiences. This enhances the overall immersive experience and makes it feel more realistic. GO Smell project offers a range of scent cartridges and other accessories for our technology. We work with two VR headsets Oculus Quest 2 and Pico 4.

GO Smell mask are primarily designed for gaming but can also be used in other applications such as relaxation, education, training, and therapy.

We consider the start of participation of our team in the BRAVEMIND VR Exposure Therapy program, which helps to return war veterans to civilian life using virtual reality, as an important direction in the development of the company, which may be of interest to Investors.

At the moment, two of our prototypes are undergoing clinical trials in real conditions in one of the military hospitals in Ukraine. We really need your help so that we can provide it to others.

The BRAVEMIND VR Exposure Therapy software was created at the University of Southern California Institute for Creative Technologies and has recently been updated to run on the latest state-of-the-art VR equipment. The work was originally supported by funding from the Dept. of Defense (Army, Office of Naval Research, Air Force) and has also received additional support from Dell Computers, AMD, Intel, The Thye Trust, Infinite Hero Foundation, and recently the SoldierStrong Foundation.

If you need more information about our company and Investors opportunity please feel free to contact us
